channel.title: Main_menu_screens on Game Dev Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Main_menu_screens on Game Dev Guide

item.title: Creating a Main Menu Screen
item.description: Overview We are going to look into the code of the Dreamlight menu screen and I will show you how to: Make a title graphic Start a GUI Theme, using buttons Change the current scene to another. Move the camera’s target Requirements This is probably the first time you’re going to be exposed to extra downloads, but they will be denoted as such : git clone https://github.com/jedStevens/<repository>
